meanings.definition: Elaborately refined or subtle in a way that is often too delicate or intricate to be easily understood or appreciated.
meanings.sent1: The artist's finespun brushstrokes created a beautiful masterpiece.
meanings.sent2: Her finespun taste in music made her a sought-after DJ.
meanings.sent3: The finespun details in the mystery novel kept readers guessing until the very end.
meanings.sent4: His finespun argument was so intricate that it left everyone in awe.
meanings.sent5: The finespun lace on her dress added an elegant touch to her outfit.

meanings.definition: Made or spun into fine threads or fibers.
meanings.sent1: The finespun silk fabric felt smooth against her skin.
meanings.sent2: The finespun wool was perfect for knitting delicate scarves.
meanings.sent3: The finespun spider web glistened in the morning dew.
meanings.sent4: The finespun fishing line was strong enough to catch big fish.
meanings.sent5: The finespun cotton was ideal for creating soft bed sheets.
